							<description>All new sound effects to replace the sounds of waterfalls, rivers, and rapids to be more fitting for Natural Waterfalls. ESL Plugin, does not require the main Natural Waterfalls plugin and can be used standalone.</description>

<config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://qconsulting.ca/fo3/ModConfig5.0.xsd">
	<moduleName>Improved Eyes Skyrim</moduleName>
	<installSteps order="Explicit">
		<installStep name="Options">
			<optionalFileGroups>
				<group name="Choose Version" type="SelectExactlyOne">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Complete">
							<description>
								Includes new textures for ALL RACES.
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\Complete.png"/>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="Complete">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Human Only">
							<description>
								New textures for HUMANS ONLY. Should you not want the other races.
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\Human.png"/>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="Human">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>		
			</optionalFileGroups>
		</installStep>
		<installStep name="Complete">
			<visible>
			<flagDependency flag="Complete" value="On" /> 
			</visible>
			<optionalFileGroups>
				<group name="Choose Version" type="SelectExactlyOne">
					<plugins>
						<plugin name="Complete - Full">
							<description>
								Complete version. Includes default replacers and new textures for all races.
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\Complete.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="00 Core - Default Eyes - Human Races" destination=""/>
								<folder source="00 Core - Default Eyes - Other Races" destination=""/>
								<folder source="00 Core - New Eyes" destination=""/>
								<folder source="01 Complete" destination=""/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Complete - No Default">
							<description>
								Complete version; NO DEFAULT REPLACERS --- Use this version if you'd prefer to use a different mod's default replacer eye textures. Includes non-default new textures for all races. (Re-install OTHER default replacer after this file.)
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\Complete.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="00 Core - New Eyes" destination=""/>
								<folder source="01 Complete ND" destination=""/>
							</files>								
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Complete - Only Default">
							<description>
								DEFAULT REPLACER ONLY --- A minimum set that will only replace the default eyes. No new eye variants. Includes new default textures for all races.
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\CompleteOD.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="00 Core - Default Eyes - Human Races" destination=""/>
								<folder source="00 Core - Default Eyes - Other Races" destination=""/>
								<folder source="01 Complete OD" destination=""/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>		
			</optionalFileGroups>
		</installStep>
		<installStep name="Human">
			<visible>
			<flagDependency flag="Human" value="On" /> 
			</visible>
			<optionalFileGroups>
				<group name="Choose Version" type="SelectExactlyOne">
					<plugins>
						<plugin name="Human - Full">
							<description>
								Human only. Includes default replacers and new textures for humans only.
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\Human.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="00 Core - Default Eyes - Human Races" destination=""/>
								<folder source="00 Core - New Eyes" destination=""/>
								<folder source="02 Human" destination=""/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Human - No Default">
							<description>
								Human only; NO DEFAULT REPLACERS --- Use this version if you'd prefer to use a different mod's default replacer eye textures. Includes textures for the humans only. Should you not want the other races. (Re-install OTHER default replacer after this file.)
							</description>
							<image path="--- Screenshots ---\Human.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="00 Core - New Eyes" destination=""/>
								<folder source="02 Human ND" destination=""/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>

					<flagDependency flag="RU" value="On"/> 
					<flagDependency flag="OStim" value="On"/> 
				</dependencies> 
				<files> 
					<file source="Translations\RU\ESPs\Ostim\HeatAndHunger.esp" destination="HeatAndHunger.esp" priority="0" /> 
				</files> 
			</pattern> 
			<pattern> 
				<dependencies operator="And"> 
					<flagDependency flag="RU" value="On"/> 
					<flagDependency flag="OSL" value="On"/> 
				</dependencies> 
				<files> 
					<file source="Translations\RU\ESPs\Sexlab plus Ostim\HeatAndHunger.esp" destination="HeatAndHunger.esp" priority="0" /> 
				</files> 
			</pattern> 
			<pattern> 
				<dependencies operator="And"> 
					<flagDependency flag="EN" value="On"/> 
					<flagDependency flag="OStim" value="On"/> 
				</dependencies> 
				<files> 
					<file source="Translations\EN\ESPs\Ostim\HeatAndHunger.esp" destination="HeatAndHunger.esp" priority="0" /> 
				</files> 
			</pattern> 
			<pattern> 
				<dependencies operator="And"> 
					<flagDependency flag="EN" value="On"/> 
					<flagDependency flag="SexLab" value="On"/> 
				</dependencies> 
				<files> 
					<file source="Translations\EN\ESPs\Sexlab\HeatAndHunger.esp" destination="HeatAndHunger.esp" priority="0" /> 
				</files> 
			</pattern> 
			<pattern> 
				<dependencies operator="And"> 
					<flagDependency flag="EN" value="On"/> 
					<flagDependency flag="OSL" value="On"/> 
				</dependencies> 
				<files> 
					<file source="Translations\EN\ESPs\Sexlab plus Ostim\HeatAndHunger.esp" destination="HeatAndHunger.esp" priority="0" /> 
				</files> 
			</pattern> 
		</patterns> 
	</conditionalFileInstalls> 
</config>

<config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://qconsulting.ca/fo3/ModConfig5.0.xsd">
	<moduleName>Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE-</moduleName>
	<moduleImage path="FOMod\CBBE.png"/>
	<requiredInstallFiles>
		<folder source="00 Required (Slim)" destination="" />
	</requiredInstallFiles>
	<installSteps order="Explicit">
		<installStep name="Base Options">
			<optionalFileGroups order="Explicit">
				<group name="Body Shape" type="SelectExactlyOne">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Slim">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Choose this option if you want to use the slim body shape. Affects the other options as well.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Slim.jpg"/>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bSlim">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Curvy">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Choose this option if you want to use the curvy default shape. Affects the other options as well.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Curvy.jpg"/>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bCurvy">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<files>
								<folder source="01 Curvy" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Vanilla Shape">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The CBBE body, shaped to conform closely to the proportions of the vanilla female body - with a few adjustments. Affects the other options as well.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Vanilla.jpg"/>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bVanilla">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<files>
								<folder source="02 Vanilla" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Underwear Options" type="SelectAtMostOne">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Underwear">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[This will replace the nude body with underwear. Color and shape options for this one follow in the next step. The bows can be removed in BodySlide. To stay nude, don't select this!]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear.jpg"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwear">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="NeverNude">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[This will replace the nude body with the vanilla underwear. To stay nude, don't select this!]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\NeverNude.jpg"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bNeverNude">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Outfit Options" type="SelectAny">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Vanilla Outfits">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Choose this option if you want to install the adjusted vanilla outfits for CBBE. Required for the shape and properly appearing body textures. Includes BodySlide addon for the outfits as well.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\CBBE.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bVanillaOutfits">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Recommended"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Face Options" type="SelectAny">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Face Pack">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Installs female head textures and masks that are compatible with the default CBBE body textures. Required if you don't use another CBBE compatible set of head and body textures already.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Face Pack.jpg"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bFacePack">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Recommended"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Dirt to Beauty Marks">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Turns the facial dirt options in the character creation into three beauty mark options. Doesn't affect NPCs, unless their face is regenerated in the Creation Kit.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Beauty Marks.jpg"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bDirtToBeautyMarks">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Eyebrow Options" type="SelectAtMostOne">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Thin + Trimmed Brows">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Female eyebrow textures that are both thinned out and trimmed. They match the hair colors more closely than vanilla eyebrows.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Thin + Trimmed Brows.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bThinTrimmedBrows">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Thin + Trimmed Brows (Light)">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Female eyebrow textures that are both thinned out and trimmed. Light option is recommended for very light hair colors.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Thin + Trimmed Brows (Light).png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bThinTrimmedBrowsLight">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Trimmed Brows">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Female eyebrow textures that are a little more trimmed compared to vanilla. They match the hair colors more closely than vanilla eyebrows.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Trimmed Brows.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bTrimmedBrows">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Trimmed Brows (Light)">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Female eyebrow textures that are a little more trimmed compared to vanilla. Light option is recommended for very light hair colors.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Trimmed Brows (Light).png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bTrimmedBrowsLight">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Bushier Brows">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Female eyebrow textures that aren't trimmed, so they are a little bushier just like vanilla. They match the hair colors more closely than vanilla eyebrows.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Bushier Brows.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bBushierBrows">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Bushier Brows (Light)">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Female eyebrow textures that aren't trimmed, so they are a little bushier just like vanilla. Light option is recommended for very light hair colors.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Bushier Brows (Light).png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bBushierBrowsLight">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Miscellaneous" type="SelectAny">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Pubic Hair">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Installs a body texture with pubic hair on the front.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Pubic Hair.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bPubicHair">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
			</optionalFileGroups>
		</installStep>
		<installStep name="Underwear Options">
			<visible>
				<flagDependency flag="bUnderwear" value="On" />
			</visible>
			<optionalFileGroups order="Explicit">
				<group name="Mesh" type="SelectExactlyOne">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Normal">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in its normal shape. The bows can be removed in BodySlide.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear.jpg"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwearRevealing">Off</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Revealing">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in its more revealing shape. The bows can be removed in BodySlide.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear Revealing.jpg"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwearRevealing">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Color" type="SelectExactlyOne">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Black">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in a black color.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear Black.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Dark Purple">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in a dark purple color.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear Dark Purple.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwearDarkPurple">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Aqua">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in a aqua color.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear Aqua.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwearAqua">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Grey">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in a grey color.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear Gray.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwearGrey">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Dark Red">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[The underwear in a dark red color.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\Underwear Dark Red.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="== Installer ==" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<conditionFlags>
								<flag name="bUnderwearDarkRed">On</flag>
							</conditionFlags>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
			</optionalFileGroups>
		</installStep>
		<installStep name="Optional Features">
			<optionalFileGroups order="Explicit">
				<group name="SKEE (RaceMenu)" type="SelectAny">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="RaceMenu Morphs (BodyMorph)">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Adds in-game morphs to RaceMenu via a script and plugin. Needs bodies and outfits to be built with the "Build Morphs" checkbox in BodySlide. Requires RaceMenu SE.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\CBBE.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="26 RaceMenu Morphs" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
				<group name="Morph Files" type="SelectAny">
					<plugins order="Explicit">
						<plugin name="Morph Files (Body)">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Adds morph (.tri) files for in-game morphs for the body. Requires RaceMenu SE to be of use.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\CBBE.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="27 Morph Files (Body)" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
						<plugin name="Morph Files (Outfits)">
							<description>
								<![CDATA[Adds morph (.tri) files for in-game morphs for the vanilla outfits. Requires RaceMenu SE to be of use.]]>
							</description>
							<image path="FOMod\CBBE.png"/>
							<files>
								<folder source="28 Morph Files (Outfits)" destination="" priority="0"/>
							</files>
							<typeDescriptor>
								<type name="Optional"/>
							</typeDescriptor>
						</plugin>
					</plugins>
				</group>
			</optionalFileGroups>
		</installStep>
	</installSteps>

<config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://qconsulting.ca/fo3/ModConfig5.0.xsd">

	<installSteps order="Explicit">

							<image path="fomod\images\full.png" />

								<flag name="Full">Active</flag> 
							</conditionFlags>

								<flag name="Vanilla">Active</flag> 
							</conditionFlags> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/>

								<flag name="512">Active</flag>

	<installSteps order="Explicit"> 
		<installStep name="Outfit Themes"> 
			<optionalFileGroups order="Explicit"> 
				<group name="Install Outfit Themes" type="SelectExactlyOne"> 
					<plugins order="Explicit"> 
						<plugin name="Required"> 
							<description>Themes decide who remains free or is enslaved. Free Women clothing is permissible for all. Slave clothing designates the wearer as a slave.

Clothing on neither list is subject to your mod configuration menu (MCM) strip settings. These clothes will be stripped from any slots you select. If that leaves a woman naked, men treat her as a slave. 

MCM options for giving sexy new outfits to NPCs, is also determined by your theme. It decides who gets an outfit and what the outfit is. 

Modders: Check the forums for instructions on how to build your own theme. It's simple if you use xEdit. Should you create a theme please share it in the forums. Perhaps it could be featured here.</description> 
							<image path="fomod\Outfit-Themes.jpg" /> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/> 
							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
					</plugins> 
				</group> 
				<group name="Free Women outfit theme" type="SelectExactlyOne"> 
					<plugins order="Explicit"> 
						<plugin name="SWR - Strong-Willed and Rich (Default)"> 
							<description>Rules: Strong-Willed & Rich (SWR) ruleset. Roleplay friendly. Permits women who appear skilled in combat to walk free. Distinguishs between highborn females and commoners. Rich women also remain free and keep their clothes.

Apply Outfits MCM: Strips a free female of all clothes and leaves her naked. She will still be free, butt naked.</description> 
							<image path="fomod\Outfit-Themes.jpg" /> 
							<files> 
								<folder source="fomod_outfit_themes\free_default" destination="" priority="0" /> 
							</files> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/> 
							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
						<plugin name="Luxury Collection"> 
							<description>Rules: Roughly 75 percent of women will remain free. Mostly the wealthy women and merchants.

Apply Outfits MCM: Women will be required to purchase and wear clothes from the Luxury Collection. Those who can't afford these will be enslaved.

Requires the Luxury Collection mod. Adds EnforcerOutfitsLuxuryCollection.esp (flagged as .esl) which must be activated alongside the Luxury Collection.esp.</description> 
							<image path="fomod\Theme-Free-LuxPix.jpg" /> 
							<conditionFlags> 
								<flag name="LuxuryCollectionSelected">Active</flag>

							</files> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<dependencyType>

							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
						<plugin name="Enslave Everyone"> 
							<description>Rules: No clothes are appropriate for Free females. Use  MCM stripping options to decide which clothing slots will be stripped. Theme effectively disables Free Woman functionality for NPCs.

Apply Outfits MCM: Not applicable. Only the Slaves Outfit can be applied.</description> 
							<image path="fomod\Outfit-Themes.jpg" /> 
							<files> 
								<folder source="fomod_outfit_themes\free_nofree" destination="" priority="0" /> 
							</files> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/> 
							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
					</plugins> 
				</group> 
				<group name="Slaves outfit theme" type="SelectExactlyOne"> 
					<plugins order="Explicit"> 
						<plugin name="Compatibility - Zaz Animation Pack (Default)"> 
							<description>Rules: Broad compatibility with mods that add slave clothing. Including Devious Devices and Zaz Animation Pack. All items tagged with SexLabNoStrip or zbfWornDevice are considered slave clothing.

Apply Outfits MCM: Enslaved women are given a collar and cuffs from the Zaz Animation Pack.

Adds EnforcerOutfitsZAP.esp (flagged as .esl)

Credit to the ZAP team for all of these clothes.</description> 
							<image path="fomod\Outfit-Themes.jpg" /> 
							<files> 
								<folder source="fomod_outfit_themes\slave_default" destination="" priority="0" /> 
							</files> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/> 
							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
						<plugin name="Compatibility - Devious Devices + ZAP (Non-DD)"> 
							<description>Rules: Broad compatibility with mods that add slave clothing.

Apply Outfits MCM: Enslaved women are given a random but themed set of devices from the ZAP and DD mods. These look like the ordinary article but do not slow down your game with scripts. Omits armbinders.

Adds Non-Devious Devices.esp and Non-Devious Devices - Masterlist.esp (both flagged as .esl) Also some optional patches that can be installed on the next page to remove items you do not want. These are all version 2022-11-22 of Corsec's Non-DD patch.

Credit to @Corsec for this theme, the Devious Devices team and Zaz Animation Pack for the clothes.</description> 
							<image path="fomod\Theme-Slave-NonDD.jpg" />

							<description>Rules: Broad compatibility with mods that add slave clothing.

Apply Outfits MCM: Enslaved women are given a set of "Non-Devious Devices". These look like ordinary DD equipment but do not slow down your game with scripts. Omits armbinders and gags.

Adds Non-Devious Devices Masterlist.esp (flagged as .esl) Also some optional patches that can be installed on the next page.

Contains the final version of Corsec's older "Master list" that was focused only on Devious Devices. As of November 2022 he has published a newer list. It mixes and matches ZAP and DD items that are free from scripts and is called the "Devious Devices + ZAP (Non-DD)" theme.

Credit to @Corsec for this theme, and the Devious Devices team for the clothes. </description>

  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/50618</description>

							</typeDescriptor>

						<plugin name="KS SMP Wigs (Requires fast CPU)"> 
							<description>Requires: 

- Faster SMP with autoAdjustMaxSkeletons set to true 	  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/57339 

- KS Hairdos - HDT SMP with wigs selected during mod installation  	  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/31300 

WARNING: These wigs use SMP so they sway in the wind and collide realistically. This can murder your FPS in enslaved cities if your CPU is not capable of processing the extra physics simulations. You need Faster SMP to run this plugin, do not use the abandoned regular SMP version. After installing that mod modify the FSMP configs.xml and set autoAdjustMaxSkeletons to true. With the correct configuration you can maintain 60+ FPS with this enabled. But you will need a mid-high end CPU. 

Giving every woman SMP hair increases SMP load. This does not increase script load. Only SMP. If your CPU can handle it you will experience no issues. If your CPU can almost handle it try tuning the FSMP configs.xml.</description> 
							<files>

WARNING: These wigs use SMP so they sway in the wind and collide realistically. This can murder your FPS in enslaved cities if your CPU is not capable of processing the extra physics simulations. You need Faster SMP to run this plugin, do not use the abandoned regular SMP version. After installing that mod modify the FSMP configs.xml and set autoAdjustMaxSkeletons to true. With the correct configuration you can maintain 60+ FPS with this enabled. But you will need a mid-high end CPU. 

Giving every woman SMP hair increases SMP load. This does not increase script load. Only SMP. If your CPU can handle it you will experience no issues. If your CPU can almost handle it try tuning the FSMP configs.xml.</description>

		<installStep name="FPS Selection (For Bounce Config)"> 
			<optionalFileGroups order="Explicit"> 
				<group name="Select Your FPS" type="SelectExactlyOne"> 
					<plugins order="Explicit"> 
						<plugin name="60 fps"> 
							<description>This will install CBPConfig file with timeStep set to 0.80

If you play at a different fps, calculate yours by dividing 48 by YOUR FPS. For example, 90 would be, 48/90 = 0.53

Set .timeStep values to 0.53 in CBPConfig.txt file.

Just choose one of them if you are going to use 3BA or BHUNP or similar because the file will be overwritten anyway.

Also, if you set FpsCorrection to 1 in CBPCSystem.ini file, you don't need to adjust this value.</description> 
							<conditionFlags> 
								<flag name="60fps">On</flag> 
								<flag name="120fps">Off</flag> 
							</conditionFlags> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/> 
							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
						<plugin name="120 fps"> 
							<description>This will install CBPConfig file with timeStep set to 0.40

If you play at a different fps, calculate yours by dividing 48 by YOUR FPS. For example, 90 would be, 48/90 = 0.53

Set .timeStep values to 0.53 in CBPConfig.txt file.

Just choose one of them if you are going to use 3BA or BHUNP or similar because the file will be overwritten anyway.

Also, if you set FpsCorrection to 1 in CBPCSystem.ini file, you don't need to adjust this value.</description> 
							<conditionFlags> 
								<flag name="120fps">On</flag> 
								<flag name="60fps">Off</flag> 
							</conditionFlags> 
							<typeDescriptor> 
								<type name="Optional"/> 
							</typeDescriptor> 
						</plugin> 
					</plugins> 
				</group> 
			</optionalFileGroups> 
		</installStep>
